Author: JoeyCash-#4065
Content: I had my Komodo storedon Agama on my phone and can no longer access it after what happened recently. What can I do about this?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@JoeyCash- 
Install https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0.13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview
Disable proxy: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers/
login to Verus Agama using your mobile seed: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029966-logging-into-verus-agama-with-an-existing-private-key-or-seed

Author: kalfster#2695
Content: @jl777c  @SHossain  @gcharang   and the rest of the Komodo team; recently and in short succession i was hit by the Cryptopia bankruptcy (loss),  the Binance hack (no loss), the Poloniex Margin Lending Pool Losses (part loss) and the Agama issue. Before that there were more  hacks/scams etc. You can understand this caused tremendous amounts of stress. I want to thoroughly thank you and your team for taking away a huge part of this stress with the actions you took, the quick follow up and the  excellent communications. I received my coins back and am as impressed as i am thankful. You restored some of the faith in crypto that i had lost in recent years ! Very excited to see what the Komodo project will bring in the future and  thanks again !

Author: ionstar#5362
Content: Can someone explain why, when I send some KMD to an address, my whole balance is sent to a completely new address? And when that happens, the interest/reward that was accumulating is gone?

Author: dxer666#8963
Content: my btc refunded. thanks komodo team

Author: Exxplosive#7274
Content: Can we start using the agama wallet on Android again

Author: Exxplosive#7274
Content: To stake?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@ionstar the new address is called a change address and that is how native mode works (you have to backup the wallet.dat file regularly)
your rewards didn't disappear. They are claimed and added to the remaining balance in the change address

Author: ionstar#5362
Content: Is that visible on the blockchain somewhere? Because I can't seem to add it up, while I usually can when claiming the interest. For example, I just sent my whol ebalance back to the original address, and the small interest that was remaining was put in the address I was transferring away from.

Author: ionstar#5362
Content: But somehow the interest that was built up until a few hours ago is nowhere to be found./

Content: @ionstar you can search the address you are sending from in the explorer: kmdexplorer.io

Content: @ionstar dm me the address, I can check

Content: it is funny, people tend to not do all the steps for a week, then the moment they do it, they wonder why it isnt processed in realtime. i have to run the refund process manually and only do it daily, so if you miss the cutoff, it needs to wait till the next day

Content: so the eta is the next day after all the claim process is completed

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: all pending KMD refunds that were properly filled out has been processed

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: about 90% of funds has been returned

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: of that about 8% are just waiting for the users to send the smartdust from old address to new address

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: only about 2% scattered in relatively small addresses are unclaimed, this is a fantastic turnout by everybody. thanks for the quick response to filing the claims, that was an important part of the process

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: all during this, the team has been tirelessly working on getting the new release out so the exchanges can reopen!
